name: MiViN_Chapter 1:The Start Of A New Beginning
name_original: MiViN_Chapter 1:The Start Of A New Beginning
description:
MiViN_Chapter 1: The Start Of A New Beginning

Dharrmin's bestie , Hamdi, has a weird disease but he won't admit it. Investigate the disease using the microbiology techniques to help him understand better on the disease. Embark the world of microbiology!
